page.title: 14Castle Rock Survey (cont)
page.content: When we got on to the Motorway Bridge we had a short rest and started to wave at the cars,lorries and buses.Most of the drivers waved back at us and some of them papped their horns.This was all very different from Wm.the Conq's day! We continued along the B591 to{Copt {Oak}where we turned north-west again on the B587 and walked back to school.On the way back we saw some pheasants and noted the bank of the old{Mediaeval park}boundary running to the south of the road from 480132 to 472137 where it turns towards Bardon Hill. We discovered that most of the land was intensively managed grassland which was used for pasture or for cutting as grass,silage or hay.We noticed that we didn't have anything like job centres, hospitals, dentists,
